ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I was wondering if there is a standard for the HTTP response as XML? So the HTTP protocol returns a HTTP response with a header and entity body. Is

Hello,

I was wondering if there is a standard for the HTTP response as XML=
?
So the HTTP protocol returns a HTTP response with a header and entity
bod=
y. Is there a standard XML form of this total response?
For example:
<HttpR=
esponse>
  <Header>
    <Name>Location</Name>
    <Value>http://test/test1<=
/Value>
  </Header>
  <Body>
    ...
  </Body>
</HttpResponse>

Regards,
Ro=
